title: The S&P 500 will keep going up this fall â€” for these 9 reasons
text:
This could be Apple's next $20 billion business

Apple Inc. could turn advertising into its next $20 billion business as the company ramps up its offerings and clamps down on ad targeting by third parties. See full story.

Retiring is one of the most complicated things we do. This will make it easier

Is it smart to buy an annuity? When do I claim Social Security? Should I stop working? See full story.

My father died last year without a will. My brother and I finally inherited his house. Will we need to pay taxes when we sell it?

'What is the best way to sell the house to avoid capital gains or taxes? Is there a specific timeline that governs this?' See full story.

U.S. households and small businesses have stockpiled a mind-blowing record cash pile of almost $17 trillion

The cash pile exceeds the $16 trillion in fiscal spending by governments worldwide to keep the global economy from collapsing during the pandemic. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Headspin Inc.'s value dropped from $1.1 billion to $300 million after CEO Manish Lachwani's alleged fraud was revealed, prosecutors and the SEC said. See full story.
